name: phira-mp-server
description: TypeScript Node.js server with TCP socket support

scripts.package:exe: npm run build && npm run make-out-dir && cross-var pkg . --targets node18-win-x64 --output ./outputs/$npm_package_version/phira-mp-nodejsver-v$npm_package_version.exe --no-bytecode
scripts.package:linux: npm run build && npm run make-out-dir && cross-var pkg . --targets node18-linux-x64 --output ./outputs/$npm_package_version/phira-mp-nodejsver-linux-v$npm_package_version --no-bytecode
scripts.package:macos-x64: npm run build && npm run make-out-dir && cross-var pkg . --targets node18-macos-x64 --output ./outputs/$npm_package_version/phira-mp-nodejsver-macos-x64-v$npm_package_version --no-bytecode
scripts.package:macos-arm64: npm run build && npm run make-out-dir && cross-var pkg . --targets node18-macos-arm64 --output ./outputs/$npm_package_version/phira-mp-nodejsver-macos-arm64-v$npm_package_version --no-bytecode
scripts.package:all: npm run package:exe && npm run package:linux && npm run package:macos-x64 && npm run package:macos-arm64
